column1: @entity6 wants to play @entity0. She goes to her store to buy a @entity0. She picks out a red@entity0. It is small enough to fit in her hand. It costs Seventy Five cents. She buys it. The @entity0 lands in a tree. @entity6 is too short to reachthe @entity0. @entity6 pets @entity3 and tells her that she is a good girl. @entity6 takes @entity3home. They eat cookies.
